page.title: 08CASTLE VALE MARKET
page.content: CASTLE VALE MARKET BEGAN IN 1977.THERE ARE 21 STALLS IN THE INDOOR MARKET AND 27 STALLS IN THE OUTDOOR MARKET. OVER HALF THE STALLS SELL FOODSTUFFS SUCH AS FISH,MEAT,SWEETS ETC.A QUARTER OF THE STALLS SELL CLOTHING.THE REST SELL GOODS RANGING FROM TOYS TO JEWELLERY. OUR MARKET IS SMALL AND IS HELD EVERY THURSDAY AND SATURDAY FROM 9.00 TO 5.00.CUSTOMERS COME FROM NEARBY AREAS TO STOP HERE.PEOPLE SHOP AT THE MARKET BECAUSE PRICES ARE CHEAPER AND THERE IS A GOOD SELECTION OF GOODS. THE STALL HOLDERS GO TO DIFFERENT MARKETS EACH DAY AND BRING THERE GOODS AND STALLS IN A VAN .
